name: Treat or Treatment
description:
It's day after Halloween. You have collected lots of sweets last night and you're dying to eat them all. But you may die literally as you are allergic to everything! You need sugar, so check labels, hope for the best, and eat as many candies as you can before mom gets home!

left click to grab candies,

then right click to check the nutrition facts

pull candies down the screen to eat them

throw them to the bin if you don't like them

carrots are healthy, but they lowers your sugar level

'r' to restart level

'f' to toggle fullscreen

'esc' to quit game

enjoy!

game made for a PolygonJam#2 theme: trick or treat
